plot: Two Argentine citizens of passing through Havana cross their destinations with two Habaneros which are mother and son. Inadvertently, one of those couples are reunited after many years and that reunion is precisely which makes dramatically change his destiny. The other couple, love at first sight and almost Platonic, strengthens their roots in the vicinity of the famous malecon habanero. Finally, and to shape of brushstroke costumbrista, a homosexual couple and another of adolescents serve secondary support to the overall development of the plot.
title: Historias clandestinas en La Habana
